dialogs.text: It's the field of the dead. Long time ago, Dionysius fought here against his own people. The graves are the only things left from them.
You want to disappear already? That's not exactly easy. If it were easy, I would have done it myself long ago.
dialogs.preview: How can I left this lonely place?

dialogs.text: Simply put, all you have to do is cross the dark forest and enter Sycarus.
Simple? Far from it! For in Sycarus live creatures far more powerful than you could ever imagine.
